venue.address_2: Liberty Lane Exit off 95 - left & left
venue.name: Park and Ride

item.description:
This is a turtle bike ride to enjoy the scenery. Since we start a little late, riding inland is a better idea than the beach road. We'll start at the park and ride in Hampton - on Exeter Road. From 95N, take the Hampton Liberty Lane exit - take a left and another left, and the parking lot (free) is visible.

Bring plenty of water. Brunch/lunch after the ride.
item.name: Biking - Seacoast - Inland
